name: kids-schedule-website
description: Interactive daily schedule for kids with AI suggestions

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production babel src config --out-dir dist --copy-files && cp index.html styles.css dist/ && sed -i '' 's/src\/script.js/script.js/g' dist/index.html && sed -i '' 's/\.\.\/config\/activities.js/.\/activities.js/g' dist/script.js
scripts.build:dev: NODE_ENV=development babel src config --out-dir dist --copy-files --source-maps && cp index.html styles.css dist/ && sed -i '' 's/src\/script.js/script.js/g' dist/index.html && sed -i '' 's/\.\.\/config\/activities.js/.\/activities.js/g' dist/script.js
scripts.build:watch: npm run build:dev && concurrently "babel src config --out-dir dist --copy-files --source-maps --watch" "http-server dist -p 8000 -c-1 --cors"
